response: [ANS] Once upon a time, there was a young boy named Timmy. He was always in a hurry, running around the house, trying to get ready for school. One morning, he woke up late and rushed to the bathroom. As he was brushing his teeth, he heard his mother's voice in the kitchen, "It's 11 o'clock!" Timmy froze, his heart pounding. He quickly finished brushing and dashed to the door, just in time to catch the school bus. From that day on, Timmy made sure to set his alarm clock and check the time regularly.
